api_list.api_description: Fetch a list of any unresolved incidents currently affecting the DigitalOcean services.
Generate a chart image based on a given Chart.js configuration.

required_parameters.name: chart_config
required_parameters.description: The Chart.js configuration object, specifying the type of chart and data.

optional_parameters.name: width
optional_parameters.description: Width of the image in pixels.

optional_parameters.name: height
optional_parameters.description: Height of the image in pixels.

api_list.template_response: Image data, typically in bytes or as a base64 string.

query: Can you check if there are any unresolved issues affecting DigitalOcean's services and summarize them in a pie chart showing the status of each?
